prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc. — Jose Ramirez, PE (Simpson Strong-Tie manufacturer detail sheet)
description: Simpson Strong-Tie manufacturer detail sheet for Strong-Wall WSWH (Wood Shearwall High-strength) system. Contains anchorage typical sections (slab on grade, curb/stemwall, brick ledge), anchor bolt details, bolt extension details, bolt template details, foundation plan view, reinforcement details, tension anchorage schedule for 2,500/3,000/4,500 PSI concrete, and shear anchorage schedule with details. ACI 318-11/14/19 compliant. Red 'APPROVED' stamp present (Anthony Montez, Building Plan Check).
key_content: Simpson Strong-Wall WSWH manufacturer detail sheet — wood shearwall high-strength anchorage system
Detail 1: WSWH Anchorage Typical Sections — slab on grade, curb or stemwall, brick ledge foundation configurations
Installation types: WSWH-RT exterior, WSWH-RT interior, WSWH-HSR (high strength rod), WSWH-HSR_XT (extended), WSWH-AB (anchor bolt)
Detail 3: WSWH Anchor Bolts — heavy hex bolt, plate washer, high strength threaded rod configurations
Detail 4: WSWH Anchor Bolt Extension (WSWH-ABE) — 12" thread rod extension coupling
Detail 6: WSWH Anchor Bolt Templates — WSWH-RT/PF panel form, WSWH-RT/WTH brick ledge, anchor bolt stabilizers
ACI 318 compliance: ACI 318-11 Appendix D, ACI 318-14 Chapter 17, ACI 318-19 Chapter 17
Seismic anchorage design per ACI 318-11 Section D.3.3.4.3 — not requiring anchorage solutions above Seismic Design Category C
Normal weight concrete minimum 150 pcf required
Tension Anchorage Schedule: WSWH model configurations for 2,500, 3,000, and 4,500 PSI concrete with footing sizes and embedment depths
Shear Anchorage Schedule: WSWH shear connection configurations with installation types and footing requirements
Foundation plan view showing WSWH anchorage solutions for 2800 PSI concrete
Reinforcement details: slab/curb, grade beam, shear reinforcement, and Section A cross-section
APPROVED: City of Long Beach, Anthony Montez — Building Plan Check
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: individual cell values in tension anchorage schedule (small text)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: individual cell values in shear anchorage schedule (small text)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific anchor bolt diameters in Detail 3
NOT SHOWN: project-specific WSWH model selection (see foundation plan S2.0 for WSWH 24x9 selections)

drawing_zones.content: Detail 1: STRONG-WALL WSWH ANCHORAGE - TYPICAL SECTIONS — slab on grade foundation, curb or stemwall foundation, brick ledge foundation cross-sections with WSWH-AB anchor bolt placement, shear reinforcement, and plate washer details
Detail 3: WSWH ANCHOR BOLTS — heavy hex bolt configurations, plate washer, high strength threaded rod with heavy hex nut, bolt diameter callouts

Detail 4: WSWH ANCHOR BOLT EXTENSION — WSWH-ABE extension with 12" thread rod and coupling details; Detail 6: WSWH ANCHOR BOLT TEMPLATES — WSWH-RT/PF panel form, WSWH-RT/WTH brick ledge, anchor bolt stabilizer configurations
Installation type diagrams: WSWH-RT Exterior Installation, WSWH-RT Interior Installation showing wall-to-foundation connection orientations

General notes: ACI 318-11/14/19 compliance, normal weight concrete min. 150 pcf, seismic anchorage per ACI 318-11 Section D.3.3.4.3, designer may specify alternate embedment/footing/anchor bolt configurations
Foundation Plan View: WSWH anchorage solutions for 2800 PSI concrete — plan view showing strong-wall placement relative to slab or curb and stemwall foundation
Reinforcement details: slab or curb reinforcement, grade beam reinforcement, shear reinforcement at grade or retaining wall, Section A cross-section through foundation

Table 1: STRONG-WALL HIGH STRENGTH WOOD SHEARWALL TENSION ANCHORAGE SCHEDULE — 2,500, 3,000, and 4,500 PSI concrete configurations with WSWH model designations, anchor bolt types, footing sizes, embedment depths (individual cell values not legible at this resolution)

Table 2: STRONG-WALL WSWH SHEAR ANCHORAGE SCHEDULE AND DETAILS — shear connection configurations by installation type and footing type, hardware specs, shear capacity values (individual cell values not legible at this resolution)
Red APPROVED stamp — City of Long Beach Electronic Plan Check, Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check
